lines.text: / Scooby Doo and Dynomutt, Dog Wonder!
[syndicated/cable theme song, for Scooby Doo segments only]

We got it all together for a brand new show! / Scooby Doo is here, again; away we go! / While Scooby Doo is running from a spooky ghost, / Shaggy is a-doin' what he does the most! / Hey come on, get involved, 'till the mystery is solved, / Hang around for Scooby Doo!
